name: BABY CARE
description: A baby nurse will assist with breast feeding, sleep for newborns, milestone and normal development, and mother baby bonding.

name: CORPORATE HEALTH SERVICES
description: The nurses provide basic healthcare services to a companyâ€™s employees.They may be responsible for providing general first aid when needed, along with promoting employee health.

name: MATERNITY CARE
description: Our home maternity service can provide you with support, advice and the confidence to attend to all of your baby's needs.Specially Early Hospital Discharge Support and Premature & Complex Baby Care

name: SPECIAL NEED SERVICES
description: As a special needs nurse, you will often have to interact with the family of the patient as well in order to teach them the skills necessary to interact with their loved one

name: SCHOOL NURSERY SERVICES
description: Beyond promoting health and safety for students within the school facility during the school day, they also encourage students to maintain healthy habits

name: CLINIC NURSE
description: We provide licensed nurses to clinic on contract basic, such nurses can perform patient care. Clinic nurses aid patients from the moment they enter the clinic by collecting patient information

name: CHECKUP SERVICES
description: Out of our social responsibility and our commitment to society, we provide these services for free

name: SKILLED NURSING SERVICES
description: The services are ordered by a licensed physician (md or do) as part of a treatment plan for a condition

name: PHYSIOTHERAPY
description: Physiotherapy has over the years proved its effectiveness in helping patients in restoring their health.
